price: Ese Uwaremye yayoberwa (ibyo yaremye)? Kandi ni We Uworohera (ibiremwa bye), Uzi byimazeyo (buri kintu).
arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alā yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
